Sharing the Kill.name: Sharing the Kill
Sharing the Kill.flavor: Your spirit companion tears into your foe, sharing its elation of the hunt with your allies.
Sharing the Kill.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Each ally adjacent to your spirit companion regains 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier hit points.

The Burning Dance.name: The Burning Dance
The Burning Dance.flavor: As your scars flare with light, your spirit companion pulses with the radiance of the sun, moon, and stars. When that radiance deflects off your burning foes, it heals your allies.
keywords: Fire, Healing, Implement, Primal, Radiant, Spirit
The Burning Dance.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.
The Burning Dance.effect: Each target takes ongoing 10 fire and radiant damage (save ends). When any target takes this ongoing damage, one ally within 5 squares of you or your spirit companion regains 10 hit points.

Spirit's Touch.name: Spirit's Touch
Spirit's Touch.flavor: Your spirit companion reaches out to your ally, lending some of its vitality to ward that ally from harm.
Spirit's Touch.trigger: An ally adjacent to your spirit companion takes damage from an attack
Spirit's Touch.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. In addition, the target gains a +2 power bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn.
